mng: to gather together, pool or collect, to happen by chance, to move close to, to exploit an opportunity

exm.mng: to gather together, pool or collect, to happen by chance, to move close to, to exploit an opportunity
to assemble, to put together
to butt in (an cause trouble), to cause trouble, to join in the fun, to get in on the action
to bring together, to make do in a bad situation, to just get by, to improvise, passable, not too bad
compact, terse, tight (schedule)
compact car model
to collect all the bits to make a whole
fortuitously, luckily, as chance has it
to approach, to lean close to
to raise enough money to do sth, to pool money, to club together (to do sth)
to put together, to make up (a set), to round up (a number to a convenient multiple), resulting in...
to serve as a stopgap, to make up a shortfall in the number of people
unluckily
at hand, within easy reach, convenient, handy
to pool resources (for a gift, project etc)
to put together various bits, to knock sth together, hash (computing), see also 散列[san3 lie4]
Compact muon solenoid (CMS)
exm.pyn: jǐn còu miǎo zǐ xiàn quān

exm.mng: can't reach the high or accept the low (idiom); not good enough for a high post, but too proud to take a low one
exm.pyn: gāo bù còu dī bù jiù

exm.mng: to scrape together enough (people, money etc)
to comply in order to please others, to accommodate sb else's taste, to make fun of
